item.title: Trump’s Deportations Only Work if Countries Agree to Take Their Citizens Back
item.description: Sending people to another country requires bilateral negotiations and diplomatic strong arming.

item.title: Egypt Fears Syria’s Revolutionary Fervor Could Be Contagious
item.description: Since Islamist rebels overthrew the Assad dictatorship in Syria, Egypt, with parallels in its own recent history, has watched warily.
